pr_title: show number of open Complaints for Exercises in Tutor dashboard

timeline.message: comment out redundant assert as it is now allowed to show open complaints for tutors
UI adjustments of the tutor-participation-graph and logic adjustments of the show finished exercises filter after discussions with Stephan
merge develop and adjust test cases in ExerciseIntegrationTest

timeline.bodyText:
This method already is too big imo. I also think we should move most of the code here into the CourseService, as logic like this should not be in a resource. Could you please start by just moving your code there? You also have some code duplication here, so you can just use the same method twice with a parameter ComplaintType complaintType.
In fact, I would move the complaint related requests to the complaint service
timeline.author: ungaralex

replies.bodyText: @maxr96 I just saw now that you are also refactoring CourseResource in #1149 . Is it ok if I apply these changes suggested by @ungaralex  here or would this be conflicting with the changes you had in mind for your PR?
replies.author: HanyaElhashemy

replies.bodyText: @HanyaElhashemy no this will not conflict my changes. You can apply them here or we can also discuss this after developers meeting.
replies.author: maxr96

timeline.bodyText: I agree, we should ignore complaints related to the tutor's assessment and subtract them from the overall number
timeline.author: ungaralex

replies.bodyText: The only reason I did not add the property numberOfTutorComplaints to the subtraction in stats.setNumberOfOpenComplaints yet and left the comment in the code instead is because numberOfTutorComplaints is currently a bit buggy and will be fixed in #1143
replies.author: HanyaElhashemy

replies.bodyText:
Aren't you two contradicting each other? Alex wants to exclude the complaints of the tutor himself and Hanya wants to include it. Or am I misunderstanding something?
I guess if the tutor should not know if there are any complaints about his assessments (or how many), it makes sense to exclude those.
replies.author: madwau

replies.bodyText: As discussed before the meeting, we both actually mean the same thing but I guess my Todo was a bit unclear, I will rephrase it. And I also suggest that the property numberOfTutorComplaints should be renamed to nrOfComplaintsAboutOwnAssessment in #1143 to avoid any misunderstanding
replies.author: HanyaElhashemy

timeline.bodyText: Same comment as for the CourseResource
